com.att.research.xacml.std

Class StdMutableAdvice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacml.std.StdMutableAdvice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Advice
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JaxpAdvice

    public class StdMutableAdvice
extends java.lang.Object
implements Advice
    Mutable implementation of the Advice interface.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.1 $
    Author:
    Christopher A. Rath

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StdMutableAdvice()
      Creates a new empty StdMutableAdvice.
      StdMutableAdvice(Identifier idIn)
      Creates a new StdMutableAdvice with the given com.att.research.xacml.Identifier as its unique identifier.
      StdMutableAdvice(Identifier idIn, java.util.Collection<AttributeAssignment> attributeAssignmentsIn)
      Creates a new StdMutableAdvice with the given com.att.research.xacml.Identifier as its unique identifier, and the given Collection of com.att.research.xacml.AttributeAssignments.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAttributeAssignment(AttributeAssignment attributeAssignment)
      Adds an AttributeAssignment to this StdMutableAdvice>
      void addAttributeAssignments(java.util.Collection<AttributeAssignment> listAttributeAssignments)
      Adds a copy of the given Collection of AttributeAssignments to this StdMutableAdvice>
      static StdMutableAdvice copy(Advice advice)
      Creates a copy of the given Advice as a new StdMutableAdvice.
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
      The implementation of the Advice interface must override the equals method with the following semantics: Two Advice objects (a1 and a2) are equal if: a1.getId().equals(a2.getId()) AND a1.getAttributeAssignments() is pair-wise equal to a2.getAttributeAssignments()
      java.util.Collection<AttributeAssignment> getAttributeAssignments()
      Gets the AttributeAssignments in this Advice object.
      Identifier getId()
      Gets the Identifier for this Advice object.
      void setAttributeAssignments(java.util.Collection<AttributeAssignment> listAttributeAssignments)
      Sets the AttributeAssignments in this StdMutableAdvice to a copy of the given Collection.
      void setId(Identifier identifier)
      Sets the Identifier representing the XACML AdviceId of the Advice represented by this StdMutableAdvice.
      java.lang.String toString()

    • Constructor Detail

      • StdMutableAdvice

        public StdMutableAdvice()
        Creates a new empty StdMutableAdvice.

      • StdMutableAdvice

        public StdMutableAdvice(Identifier idIn,
                java.util.Collection<AttributeAssignment> attributeAssignmentsIn)
        Creates a new StdMutableAdvice with the given com.att.research.xacml.Identifier as its unique identifier, and the given Collection of com.att.research.xacml.AttributeAssignments. A copy of the AttributeAssignments is made.
        Parameters:
        idIn - the Identifier that uniquely identifies this StdMutableAdvice. Should not be null.
        attributeAssignmentsIn - the Collection of AttributeAssignments for this StdMutableAdvice. May be null.

      • StdMutableAdvice

        public StdMutableAdvice(Identifier idIn)
        Creates a new StdMutableAdvice with the given com.att.research.xacml.Identifier as its unique identifier.
        Parameters:
        idIn - the Identifier that uniquely identifies this StdMutableAdvice. May be null.

      • getAttributeAssignments

        public java.util.Collection<AttributeAssignment> getAttributeAssignments()
        Description copied from interface: Advice
        Gets the AttributeAssignments in this Advice object. If there are no AttributeAssignments in this Advice, an empty Collection must be returned. The returned Collection should not be modified. Implementations are free to return an immutable view to enforce this.
        Specified by:
        getAttributeAssignments in interface Advice
        Returns:
        the Collection of AttributeAssignments in this Advice object.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Description copied from interface: Advice
        The implementation of the Advice interface must override the equals method with the following semantics: Two Advice objects (a1 and a2) are equal if: a1.getId().equals(a2.getId()) AND a1.getAttributeAssignments() is pair-wise equal to a2.getAttributeAssignments()
        Specified by:
        equals in interface Advice
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
